item.description:
Daphne is calling the shots on this one. Her house is right on the way, so we could meet at Starbucks, and pick her up on hte way.

Giant warehouse sale Saturday???!!!

Itâ€™s from 9 to 3. We have a lot of yarn at $1 (most of what is on sale is $1 a ball). We are liquidating a lot of old stock. Plus some of the regular stock will be a wholesale prices to reduce our inventory. Will you be coming up?

Helene Rush
Knit One, Crochet Too, Inc.
91 Tandberg Trail, Unit 6
Windham, ME 04062
